Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to use of accrued sick time, compensation time or vacation time
Summary: Relates to use of accrued sick time, compensation time or vacation time.
LawCode: Add ยง159-d, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to use of accrued sick time, compensation time or vacation time
